name: Map Audio Device
description: Map audio device (USB or PCI) to LXC container or VM

parameters.name: Audio Card
parameters.description: Audio card identifier in format card0, card1, etc. (e.g., card0 for first audio card)

parameters.name: ID of the VM
parameters.description: ID of the LXC container or VM to which the audio device will be assigned

parameters.name: UID
parameters.description: Optional: UID of the user in the container who should have access to the audio device (LXC only). Default is 0 (root). If provided, permissions will be set on the host device (mapped UID = container UID + 100000). For VMs, this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: GID
parameters.description: Optional: GID of the group in the container who should have access to the audio device (LXC only). Default is 0 (root). If provided, permissions will be set on the host device (mapped GID = container GID + 100000). For VMs, this parameter is ignored.

parameters.name: Container Device Paths
parameters.description: Optional: Comma-separated container device paths (default: auto-detect based on card number). Note: This parameter is currently not used, devices are mapped to standard /dev/snd/* paths.
